sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE160401 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_YYMM , ELCT_DATE , SUPR_TXAM , BUAM_TXAM , INBS_AMNT , STCK_INAM , SPBM_TXAM , ECIN_TXAM , TAXM_ECIN , SPCI_HLTH , SPCI_EMPF , NATN_PSNF , EARN_TAXN , IHTX_TAXN , NNKS_SSUM , ETCC_TXAM , ETCC_ETAM , PAY_PYMT_SUM_TOT_AMNT , PAY_PYMT_FREE_DTY_SUM , CURR_WORK_FREE_DTUS_AMNT , CURR_WORK_EMPTK_WDRW_SUM , CURR_WORK_ECTE_RETCE_SUM , CURR_WORK_RCP_INSUR_SUM , CURR_WORK_RCP_AGGR_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #elctYymm# , #elctDate# , #suprTxam# , #buamTxam# , #inbsAmnt# , #stckInam# , #spbmTxam# , #ecinTxam# , #taxmEcin# , #spciHlth# , #spciEmpf# , #natnPsnf# , #earnTaxn# , #ihtxTaxn# , #nnksSsum# , #etccTxam# , #etccEtam# , #payPymtSumTotAmnt# , #payPymtFreeDtySum# , #currWorkFreeDtusAmnt# , #currWorkEmptkWdrwSum# , #currWorkEcteRetceSum# , #currWorkRcpInsurSum# , #currWorkRcpAggrSum# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE160401 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm# , ELCT_DATE=#elctDate# , SUPR_TXAM=#suprTxam# , BUAM_TXAM=#buamTxam# , INBS_AMNT=#inbsAmnt# , STCK_INAM=#stckInam# , SPBM_TXAM=#spbmTxam# , ECIN_TXAM=#ecinTxam# , TAXM_ECIN=#taxmEcin# , SPCI_HLTH=#spciHlth# , SPCI_EMPF=#spciEmpf# , NATN_PSNF=#natnPsnf# , EARN_TAXN=#earnTaxn# , IHTX_TAXN=#ihtxTaxn# , ETCC_TXAM=#etccTxam# , NNKS_SSUM=#nnksSsum# , ETCC_ETAM=#etccEtam# , PAY_PYMT_SUM_TOT_AMNT=#payPymtSumTotAmnt# , PAY_PYMT_FREE_DTY_SUM=#payPymtFreeDtySum# , CURR_WORK_FREE_DTUS_AMNT=#currWorkFreeDtusAmnt# , CURR_WORK_EMPTK_WDRW_SUM=#currWorkEmptkWdrwSum# , CURR_WORK_ECTE_RETCE_SUM=#currWorkEcteRetceSum# , CURR_WORK_RCP_INSUR_SUM=#currWorkRcpInsurSum# , CURR_WORK_RCP_AGGR_SUM=#currWorkRcpAggrSum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm#

DELETE FROM YE160401 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_YYMM , ELCT_DATE , SUPR_TXAM , BUAM_TXAM , INBS_AMNT , STCK_INAM , SPBM_TXAM , ECIN_TXAM , TAXM_ECIN , SPCI_HLTH , SPCI_EMPF , NATN_PSNF , EARN_TAXN , IHTX_TAXN , NNKS_SSUM , ETCC_TXAM , ETCC_ETAM , PAY_PYMT_SUM_TOT_AMNT , PAY_PYMT_FREE_DTY_SUM , CURR_WORK_FREE_DTUS_AMNT , CURR_WORK_EMPTK_WDRW_SUM , CURR_WORK_ECTE_RETCE_SUM , CURR_WORK_RCP_INSUR_SUM , CURR_WORK_RCP_AGGR_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE160401 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ELCT_YYMM=#elctYymm#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ELCT_YYMM , ELCT_DATE , SUPR_TXAM , BUAM_TXAM , INBS_AMNT , STCK_INAM , SPBM_TXAM , ECIN_TXAM , TAXM_ECIN , SPCI_HLTH , SPCI_EMPF , NATN_PSNF , EARN_TAXN , NNKS_SSUM , IHTX_TAXN , ETCC_TXAM , ETCC_ETAM , PAY_PYMT_SUM_TOT_AMNT , PAY_PYMT_FREE_DTY_SUM , CURR_WORK_FREE_DTUS_AMNT , CURR_WORK_EMPTK_WDRW_SUM , CURR_WORK_ECTE_RETCE_SUM , CURR_WORK_RCP_INSUR_SUM , CURR_WORK_RCP_AGGR_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE160401 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , ELCT_YYMM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE160401 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
